name: LOYAL SOURCE
description: Specializes in government contract staffing for a number of US federal agencies.
sampleDescriptions: Proposed statutory change to the FY2023 Department of Homeland Security authorization/appropriations legislation to allow licensure portability for medical support providers contracted by DHS.
